entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
